name: My Kindergarten Learning Adventure
description:
A fun educational game designed for kids 3-6 years old. We have a wide range of learning games for kids with identifying animals, fruits & vegetables, the alphabet, common buildings, counting to 20, counting to 100 by 10s, and more. To match two objects is an essential technique that kids can use to define the connection between words and images. The game follows a general curriculum most Kindergarten classes teach throughout the year, and the game has been proven to increase children’s performance in school!


Why choose My Kindergarten Learning Adventure (Early Education game):
👉 Children 3-6 practice the basics of letters and numbers with all-in-one educational game
👉 Builds interest in problem solving, and their want to learn more!
👉 Puzzle and matching games improves your child’s memory
👉 Learning Colors & Shapes in the game are enhanced with our fun interactive environment
👉 Increases their hand/eye coordination as well as cognitive skills.
👉 Help to teach your hard to grasp skills such as punctuations, and reading emotions!


Since this is an all-in-one educational game for kids, it's excellent for keeping track of your kid’s progress. It features a built-in coin/reward system, so you can tell how much they have been studying! It is a scientific truth that children perceive everything from birth. So, all the bases in the early learning games eventually form Basic education to successful schooling. We assure you that your child can be learning safely, free from all ads and aps that collect your private information, and at an accurate level.

This has proven to be fantastic early learning games app for preschoolers 3 to 6 years old and even for first-graders! See below for just some of what they will learn.

⏱ Clock Time:
The Telling Time on the Clock game helps your child to understand the concepts of time, and counting simultaneously. Some misconceptions are usually associated early on with the hour and minute hands. This game has taken several approaches to break down how to count by 5’s when looking at an analog clock, and how to properly read the time.

📄 Sight Words:
Sight words are a technique used for teaching specific words that may not follow the common sounds in the alphabet. We combine the use of sight words with the use of a colorful game and videos for kids to keep their attention going.

☁ Match Seasons and Weathers:
Matching Seasons/Weather/Time of Day provides several fun matching weather exercises for kids. It motivates them to describe our outside world using fun images to identify stuff such as the seasons; spring, autumn, summer, and winter. Kids must match objects they think corresponds to the correct answer.

🍒 Fruits and Vegetables:
In the Fruits and Vegetable game, kids are shown several objects, and must separate between colors, objects, and fruits/vegetables.

🦄 First and Last, Punctuations, Various puzzles:
This game also features some more uncommon games such as helping children to identify sequences, and proper use of punctuation. With a great voice actor and coach, children enjoy moving the punctuation symbols into the right places and watching the cartoons come to life! They also love our dinosaur puzzles!

➕ Basic Math:
Here kids will have a blast learning addition and subtraction through counting, visual effects, and movies! Their math skills are further tested in games that have them counting by 5s and 10s with some relaxing classical piano sounds.

👀 Rhyming words matchup:
My Kindergarten Learning Adventure tackles some of the harder concepts to grasp such as how to read people’s emotions. Learn facial expressions that might signal someone is Happy, Sad, maybe Shy or Bored.

We have much more to keep your kids learning in this Early Education game. The first release in the new Learning Adventure Series!
